hanzi-su-wiki:
消

Значения

Гасить; стирать; уничтожать; гаснуть; стираться, исчезать

Мнемоника

  • Китайская еда очень острая. Гасить водой 氵 жгучесть наперченного и мелко 小 нарезанного мяса 月.

  • "Луна 月 исчезла в воде."
purpleculture_pinyin:
xiāo
to disappear; to vanish; to eliminate; to spend (time); have to; need
исчезнуть; исчезать; устранить; тратить время); иметь; необходимость
rtega_mnemonic:
消消RSvanish, die out, melt away, extinguish
  • water 氵 makes a body ⺼ of fire ⺌ vanish
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 肖 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
消费 [ xiāo fèi ]: to consume; to spend
取消 [ qǔ xiāo ]: to cancel; cancellation
消失 [ xiāo shī ]: to disappear; to fade away
消除 [ xiāo chú ]: to eliminate; to remove
消灭 [ xiāo miè ]: to put an end to; to annihilate; to cause to perish; to perish; annihilation (in quantum field theory)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 肖 [ xiào ] to resemble, to look like; to be like
heisig_chinese_memo: Water being thrown on a candle to extinguish the flame and stop it from lighting the house on fire.
heisig_constituent: extinguish, water, water droplets, water pistol, resemblance, spark, candle, small, little, moon, month, flesh, part of the body
heisig_story: Among the many things water is useful for is extinguishing fires, and that is just what we have here. First of all, take the water at the left as the drops of water that are used to depict water in general. In the best of all possible worlds, the most efficient way to extinguish a fire would be to see that each drop of water hits one spark of the conflagration. An unthinkable bit of utopian fire fighting, you say to yourself, but helpful for assigning this key word its primitives.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: extinguish, blow out, turn off, neutralize, cancel
koohiiStory1: To extinguish a SPARK, you need WATER.
koohiiStory2: You need a few drops of water to extinguish the candle.
jp_example_words:
打ち消し(うちけし): negation, denial, negative
消去(しょうきょ): elimination, erasing, dying out, melting away
消耗(しょうこう): exhaustion, consumption
消息(しょうそく): news, letter, circumstances
打ち消す(うちけす): deny, negate, contradict
消しゴム(けしゴム): eraser, India rubber
消化(しょうか): digestion
消極的(しょうきょくてき): passive
消毒(しょうどく): disinfection, sterilization
消費(しょうひ): consumption, expenditure
消防(しょうぼう): fire fighting, fire department
消防署(しょうぼうしょ): fire station
消耗(しょうもう): exhaustion, consumption
取り消す(とりけす): cancel

jp_readingExamples: 消える (き.える), 消す (け.す)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A long time ago a huge tsunami swept a triceratops up into the moon and extinguished its life.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: I’m sure you’ve heard many theories on how dinosaurs went extinct. Well, this is the real story. Imagine this poor triceratops and all his friends being extinguished by this powerful tsunami, sweeping them up into the moon where there's no air to breathe or leaves to eat.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This famous event where almost all life was extinguished is reenacted every year for the Shougun (しょう). He's got a bit of an unhealthy obsession with extinguishing life...
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Watch the Shougun's eyes light up as an actor dressed like a tsunami crashes into an actor dressed as a triceratops and all of the lights on the stage are extinguished. Spooky...
Ru_Meaning: extinguish, blow out, turn off, neutralize, cancel

消えるきえる
  • гаснуть, тухнуть; таять (о снеге); исчезать

  • расходование, потребление
    • 消極的しょうきょくてき
  • пассивный, бездеятельный; негативный
    • 消防しょうぼう
  • пожарная охрана; пожарные, пожарники
    • 消滅しょうめつ
  • уничтожение, исчезновение
    • 消失しょうしつ
  • исчезновение, пропажа
Ru_trainchinese: xiāo: (глаг) исчезать, пропадать; избавляться от, устранять; проводить не спеша (время); нужно, требуется
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if it resembles (肖) water (氵) you can use it to extinguish
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Water being thrown on a candle to extinguish the flame and stop it from lighting the house on fire.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " water " to " xiao " sound. " Eliminate " originally refers to the melting of ice and snow, as in "Book of Rites. Moon Order: "When the snow does not fall, the ice disappears." Later it refers to the disappearance and disappearance of various things. "Said Wen": "Eliminate, do it. From the water, Xiao Sheng." Such as "Mencius. Teng Wengong 2": "Dangers and obstacles are far away, the harm of birds and beasts is eliminated, and then people have to settle down." Zhao Qi's note: "The water goes, so the birds and beasts are eliminated." "Han Feizi . Jie Lao: "Only the judgment of the husband and the heaven and the earth is also born, and it is common for the world to dissipate and never die." "The judgment of the heaven and the earth" refers to the opening of the world.

The extension of " eliminate " means to remove and eliminate. "Guang Ya. Interpretation IV": "Eliminate, eliminate also." Such as "Huainanzi. "Chu Zhen": "The brave loses his qi, the greedy loses his desire." "Lun Heng. "Unusual Void": "Although the sky sees monsters, there are fierce dreams lying down, but they still destroy them to get blessings." " Monsters " refer to abnormal and weird things.

" Cost " means to reduce or consume. "Release name. "Shi Yanyu": "Eliminate, cut also, and reduce and cut also." "Words. "Ministry of Water": "Eliminate, decline, and retreat." Such as "Yi. "Thailand": "A gentleman is a master, but a villain is a man." "Huainanzi. Original Dao": "This anointing candle and the like, the fire is over, but it disappears."

" Eliminate " means to dismiss and kill. For example, Wei Cao Zhi of the Three Kingdoms "Ganjie Fu": "Climb the heights for eternal hope, hope to eliminate the day and forget the worries." "Selected Works. Tao Yuanming "Returning": "Happy relatives' love words, music and piano books to relieve worries."

" Xiao " is the name of Chinese medicine, also known as "Xiaoke", which means modern diabetes. "Release name. "Release the disease": "Die, 㵣, thirst. The kidney qi is not enough in the chest and stomach, and the body fluid diminishes thirst, so I want to get water." Such as "Historical Records. Biographies of Sima Xiangru: "Xiang is like a stutter and writes well. He often suffers from diabetes." "The Biography of King Li and Deng Lai": "(Li Tong) has always been a prime minister and he is a prime minister. He has been begging for bones for years, and the emperor favored them." "Begging bones" was an automatic resignation by ancient officials. The language means that the bones can be buried in their hometown. The whole sentence means that Li Tong is suffering from Diabetes, as the prime minister, but unable to work due to illness, so he has resigned to the monarch many times, but the monarch has repeatedly treated him favorably.

" Xiao " is also a general term for mineral salts such as Glauber's salt, saltpeter, and nitrate, which can be used as medicine and later written as " nitrogen ". "Compendium of Materia Medica. Jinshi Department. "Piao Xiao": "This thing disappears when it sees water, and it can digest all things, so it is called elimination. Born in the place of bittern, it looks like the end salt. Every cow and horse skin must be cured by this, so there is salt elimination. It is called skin disappearing." Such as "Historical Records. The Biography of Bian Que Cang: "The irritable person has remaining illnesses, drink it to eliminate the stone together." " Qi " is pronounced as " agent ". "Wuwei Han Dynasty Medical Slips" Jian 86 A also has "eliminating stones".

" Eliminate " and " sell " mean melting and smelting. Zhu Junsheng "Shuowen Tongxun Dingsheng": "Eliminate, borrow to sell." Such as "Lun Heng. "Lei Xu": "When a smelter's iron is also consumed, it takes soil as its shape. Dryness will cause iron to fall, and if not, it will overflow and shoot." "Selected Works. Xie Huilian "Autumn Huai": "The gold and stone are finally destroyed, and the red is temporarily carved out." See " Sales ".

" Eliminate " means to withstand and tolerate. For example, Xin Qiji of the Southern Song Dynasty "Mo Yu'er": "It is more able to eliminate the storms, and return in spring in a hurry." "The Romance of the Gods" Chapter 80: "Jiang Shang has suffered repeated disasters. How can you endure it?"

" Eliminate " means worthy and worthy. For example, Sikong Tu of the Tang Dynasty "Huaixi": "Don't boast the prestige of one hundred thousand soldiers, and eliminate the loyalty and goodness." In the Northern Song Dynasty, Liuyong "Feng Qiwu": "The belt is getting wider and he will not regret it, and it will be haggard for Iraq ."

" Cancel " means news, news. "Jade articles. "The Ministry of Water" "eliminates, the news is also." For example, Du Fu in the Tang Dynasty "No News": "The survivors have no news, the deceased are dust and mud." Guan Hanqing, Yuan Dynasty, "Saving Wind and Dust." The third fold": "I am the one who communicates with each other.

" Cancel " also indicates a need. For example, Lu Yan's "Queju" in the Tang Dynasty: "A half-day to go back and forth between eight thousand and a half day, I never lost my way back home." On "People's Words Are Awesome": "No matter how you describe it, it doesn't matter to the strong. With just a letter, there will be truths and errors or an apology and then published."
humanum_short_description_en: From " water " to " shaw " sound. The original meaning is the melting of ice and snow, and later it refers to the dissipation and disappearance of things.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「肖」聲。「消」本指冰雪溶化，如《禮記．月令》：「時雪不降，冰凍消釋。」後來泛指各種事物的消散、消失。《說文》：「消，盡也。从水，肖聲。」如《孟子．滕文公下》：「險阻既遠，鳥獸之害人者消，然後人得平土而居之。」趙岐注：「水去，故鳥獸害人者消盡也。」《韓非子．解老》：「唯夫與天地之剖判也具生，至天地之消散也不死不衰者謂常。」「天地之剖判」指天地的開闢。

　　「消」引申表示除去、消除。《廣雅．釋詁四》：「消，滅也。」如《淮南子．俶真》：「勇者衰其氣，貪者消其欲。」《論衡．異虛》：「天雖見妖，臥有凶夢，猶滅妖消凶以獲福。」「妖」指反常、怪異的事物。

　　「消」表示削減、消耗。《釋名．釋言語》：「消，削也，言減削也。」《字彙．水部》：「消，衰也，退也。」如《易．泰》：「君子道長，小人道消也。」《淮南子．原道》：「此膏燭之類也，火逾然而消逾亟。」

　　「消」表示排遣、消磨。如三國魏曹植〈感節賦〉：「登高墉以永望，冀消日以忘憂。」《文選．陶淵明〈歸去來〉》：「悅親戚之情話，樂琴書以消憂。」

　　「消」是中醫的病名，又名「消渴」，即現代的糖尿病。《釋名．釋疾病》：「消㵣，㵣，渴也。腎氣不周於胸胃中，津潤消渴，故欲得水也。」如《史記．司馬相如列傳》：「相如口吃而善著書，常有消渴疾。」《後漢書．李王鄧來列傳》：「（李通）素有消疾，自為宰相，謝病不視事，連年乞骸骨，帝每優寵之。」「乞骸骨」是古代官員自動請辭之語，表示使骸骨可以歸葬故鄉。全句意謂李通患有消渴病，身為宰相卻因病不能工作，故多次向君主請辭，但君主卻屢次優待他。

　　「消」亦是芒硝、硝石、樸硝等礦物鹽類的泛稱，可入藥，後寫作「硝」。《本草綱目．金石部．樸消》：「此物見水即消，又能消化諸物，故謂之消。生於鹽鹵之地，狀似末鹽，凡牛馬諸皮須此治熟，故今俗有鹽消、皮消之稱。」如《史記．扁鵲倉公列傳》：「躁者有餘病，即飲以消石一齊。」「齊」讀為「劑」。《武威漢代醫簡》簡86甲亦有「消石」。

　　「消」又通「銷」，表示熔化、熔煉。朱駿聲《說文通訓定聲》：「消，叚借為銷。」如《論衡．雷虛》：「當冶工之消鐵也，以土為形，燥則鐵下，不則躍溢而射。」《文選．謝惠連〈秋懷〉》：「金石終消毀，丹青暫彫煥。」參見「銷」。

　　「消」表示承受、禁受。如南宋辛棄疾〈摸魚兒〉：「更能消、幾番風雨，匆匆春又歸去。」《封神演義》第80回：「姜尚屢遭大難，每勞列位道兄動履，尚何以消受。」

　　「消」表示抵得、值得。如唐代司空圖〈淮西〉：「莫誇十萬兵威盛，消箇忠良効順無。」北宋柳永〈鳳棲梧〉：「衣帶漸寬終不悔，為伊消得人憔悴。」

　　「消」表示消息、音信。《玉篇．水部》「消，消息也。」如唐代杜甫〈無家別〉：「存者無消息，死者為塵泥。」元代關漢卿《救風塵．第三折》：「兩頭往來，傳消寄信都是我。」

　　「消」也表示需要。如唐代呂岩〈絕句〉：「來往八千消半日，依前歸路不曾迷。」魯迅《且介亭雜文二集．論「人言可畏」》：「無論你怎麼描寫，在強者是毫不要緊旳，只消一封信，就會有正誤或道歉接著登出來。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「肖」聲。本義是冰雪溶化，後來泛指事物的消散、消失。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
消
Pinyin: xiāo
English Definition: to disappear; to vanish; to eliminate; to spend (time); have to; need
Total strokes: 10; Radical: 水
Pictophonetic: 肖 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 肖 [ xiào ] to resemble, to look like; to be like
Step by Step Stroke Sequence: Download Customize Pin it
Example Words:
消费 [ xiāo fèi ]: to consume; to spend
取消 [ qǔ xiāo ]: to cancel; cancellation
消失 [ xiāo shī ]: to disappear; to fade away
消除 [ xiāo chú ]: to eliminate; to remove
消灭 [ xiāo miè ]: to put an end to; to annihilate; to cause to perish; to perish; annihilation (in quantum field theory)
More: 消* | *消 | *消*

  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 肖 [ xiào ] to resemble, to look like; to be like
①溶化，散失：烟消云散。消融(亦作“消溶”)。消失。消逝。消亡。消沉。消极。消化。
②灭掉，除去：消除。消灭。消毒。消炎。
③把时间度过去：消夜。消夏。消闲。消遣。消磨。
④减少，损失，耗费：消耗。消损。消退。
⑤需要：不消说。
⑥中医学病名：消疾。消渴。

從「 水 」，「 肖 」聲。「 消 」本指冰雪溶化，如《禮記．月令》：「時雪不降，冰凍消釋。」後來泛指各種事物的消散、消失。《說文》：「消，盡也。从水，肖聲。」如《孟子．滕文公下》：「險阻既遠，鳥獸之害人者消，然後人得平土而居之。」趙岐注：「水去，故鳥獸害人者消盡也。」《韓非子．解老》：「唯夫與天地之剖判也具生，至天地之消散也不死不衰者謂常。」「天地之剖判」指天地的開闢。 「 消 」引申表示除去、消除。《廣雅．釋詁四》：「消，滅也。」如《淮南子．俶真》：「勇者衰其氣，貪者消其欲。」《論衡．異虛》：「天雖見妖，臥有凶夢，猶滅妖消凶以獲福。」「 妖 」指反常、怪異的事物。 「 消 」表示削減、消耗。《釋名．釋言語》：「消，削也，言減削也。」《字彙．水部》：「消，衰也，退也。」如《易．泰》：「君子道長，小人道消也。」《淮南子．原道》：「此膏燭之類也，火逾然而消逾亟。」 「 消 」表示排遣、消磨。如三國魏曹植〈感節賦〉：「登高墉以永望，冀消日以忘憂。」《文選．陶淵明〈歸去來〉》：「悅親戚之情話，樂琴書以消憂。」 「 消 」是中醫的病名，又名「消渴」，即現代的糖尿病。《釋名．釋疾病》：「消㵣，㵣，渴也。腎氣不周於胸胃中，津潤消渴，故欲得水也。」如《史記．司馬相如列傳》：「相如口吃而善著書，常有消渴疾。」《後漢書．李王鄧來列傳》：「（李通）素有消疾，自為宰相，謝病不視事，連年乞骸骨，帝每優寵之。」「乞骸骨」是古代官員自動請辭之語，表示使骸骨可以歸葬故鄉。全句意謂李通患有消渴病，身為宰相卻因病不能工作，故多次向君主請辭，但君主卻屢次優待他。 「 消 」亦是芒硝、硝石、樸硝等礦物鹽類的泛稱，可入藥，後寫作「 硝 」。《本草綱目．金石部．樸消》：「此物見水即消，又能消化諸物，故謂之消。生於鹽鹵之地，狀似末鹽，凡牛馬諸皮須此治熟，故今俗有鹽消、皮消之稱。」如《史記．扁鵲倉公列傳》：「躁者有餘病，即飲以消石一齊。」「 齊 」讀為「 劑 」。《武威漢代醫簡》簡86甲亦有「消石」。 「 消 」又通「 銷 」，表示熔化、熔煉。朱駿聲《說文通訓定聲》：「消，叚借為銷。」如《論衡．雷虛》：「當冶工之消鐵也，以土為形，燥則鐵下，不則躍溢而射。」《文選．謝惠連〈秋懷〉》：「金石終消毀，丹青暫彫煥。」參見「 銷 」。 「 消 」表示承受、禁受。如南宋辛棄疾〈摸魚兒〉：「更能消、幾番風雨，匆匆春又歸去。」《封神演義》第80回：「姜尚屢遭大難，每勞列位道兄動履，尚何以消受。」 「 消 」表示抵得、值得。如唐代司空圖〈淮西〉：「莫誇十萬兵威盛，消箇忠良効順無。」北宋柳永〈鳳棲梧〉：「衣帶漸寬終不悔，為伊消得人憔悴。」 「 消 」表示消息、音信。《玉篇．水部》「消，消息也。」如唐代杜甫〈無家別〉：「存者無消息，死者為塵泥。」元代關漢卿《救風塵．第三折》：「兩頭往來，傳消寄信都是我。」 「 消 」也表示需要。如唐代呂岩〈絕句〉：「來往八千消半日，依前歸路不曾迷。」魯迅《且介亭雜文二集．論「人言可畏」》：「無論你怎麼描寫，在強者是毫不要緊旳，只消一封信，就會有正誤或道歉接著登出來。」
From " water" to " xiao" sound. " Eliminate" originally refers to the melting of ice and snow, as in "Book of Rites. Moon Order: "When the snow does not fall, the ice disappears." Later it refers to the disappearance and disappearance of various things. "Said Wen": "Eliminate, do it. From the water, Xiao Sheng." Such as "Mencius. Teng Wengong 2": "Dangers and obstacles are far away, the harm of birds and beasts is eliminated, and then people have to settle down." Zhao Qi's note: "The water goes, so the birds and beasts are eliminated." "Han Feizi . Jie Lao: "Only the judgment of the husband and the heaven and the earth is also born, and it is common for the world to dissipate and never die." "The judgment of the heaven and the earth" refers to the opening of the world. The extension of " eliminate" means to remove and eliminate. "Guang Ya. Interpretation IV": "Eliminate, eliminate also." Such as "Huainanzi. "Chu Zhen": "The brave loses his qi, the greedy loses his desire." "Lun Heng. "Unusual Void": "Although the sky sees monsters, there are fierce dreams lying down, but they still destroy them to get blessings." " Monsters" refer to abnormal and weird things. " Cost" means to reduce or consume. "Release name. "Shi Yanyu": "Eliminate, cut also, and reduce and cut also." "Words. "Ministry of Water": "Eliminate, decline, and retreat." Such as "Yi. "Thailand": "A gentleman is a master, but a villain is a man." "Huainanzi. Original Dao": "This anointing candle and the like, the fire is over, but it disappears." " Eliminate" means to dismiss and kill. For example, Wei Cao Zhi of the Three Kingdoms "Ganjie Fu": "Climb the heights for eternal hope, hope to eliminate the day and forget the worries." "Selected Works. Tao Yuanming "Returning": "Happy relatives' love words, music and piano books to relieve worries." " Xiao" is the name of Chinese medicine, also known as "Xiaoke", which means modern diabetes. "Release name. "Release the disease": "Die, 㵣, thirst. The kidney qi is not enough in the chest and stomach, and the body fluid diminishes thirst, so I want to get water." Such as "Historical Records. Biographies of Sima Xiangru: "Xiang is like a stutter and writes well. He often suffers from diabetes." "The Biography of King Li and Deng Lai": "(Li Tong) has always been a prime minister and he is a prime minister. He has been begging for bones for years, and the emperor favored them." "Begging bones" was an automatic resignation by ancient officials. The language means that the bones can be buried in their hometown. The whole sentence means that Li Tong is suffering from Diabetes, as the prime minister, but unable to work due to illness, so he has resigned to the monarch many times, but the monarch has repeatedly treated him favorably. " Xiao" is also a general term for mineral salts such as Glauber's salt, saltpeter, and nitrate, which can be used as medicine and later written as " nitrogen". "Compendium of Materia Medica. Jinshi Department. "Piao Xiao": "This thing disappears when it sees water, and it can digest all things, so it is called elimination. Born in the place of bittern, it looks like the end salt. Every cow and horse skin must be cured by this, so there is salt elimination. It is called skin disappearing." Such as "Historical Records. The Biography of Bian Que Cang: "The irritable person has remaining illnesses, drink it to eliminate the stone together." " Qi" is pronounced as " agent". "Wuwei Han Dynasty Medical Slips" Jian 86 A also has "eliminating stones". " Eliminate" and " sell" mean melting and smelting. Zhu Junsheng "Shuowen Tongxun Dingsheng": "Eliminate, borrow to sell." Such as "Lun Heng. "Lei Xu": "When a smelter's iron is also consumed, it takes soil as its shape. Dryness will cause iron to fall, and if not, it will overflow and shoot." "Selected Works. Xie Huilian "Autumn Huai": "The gold and stone are finally destroyed, and the red is temporarily carved out." See " Sales". " Eliminate" means to withstand and tolerate. For example, Xin Qiji of the Southern Song Dynasty "Mo Yu'er": "It is more able to eliminate the storms, and return in spring in a hurry." "The Romance of the Gods" Chapter 80: "Jiang Shang has suffered repeated disasters. How can you endure it?" " Eliminate" means worthy and worthy. For example, Sikong Tu of the Tang Dynasty "Huaixi": "Don't boast the prestige of one hundred thousand soldiers, and eliminate the loyalty and goodness." In the Northern Song Dynasty, Liuyong "Feng Qiwu": "The belt is getting wider and he will not regret it, and it will be haggard for Iraq ." " Cancel" means news, news. "Jade articles. "The Ministry of Water" "eliminates, the news is also." For example, Du Fu in the Tang Dynasty "No News": "The survivors have no news, the deceased are dust and mud." Guan Hanqing, Yuan Dynasty, "Saving Wind and Dust." The third fold": "I am the one who communicates with each other. " Cancel" also indicates a need. For example, Lu Yan's "Queju" in the Tang Dynasty: "A half-day to go back and forth between eight thousand and a half day, I never lost my way back home." 消
xiāo
溶化，散失：烟消云散。消融（亦作“消溶”）。消失。消逝。消亡。消沉。消极。消化。
灭掉，除去：消除。消灭。消毒。消炎。
把时间度过去：消夜。消夏。消闲。消遣。消磨（m?）。
减少，损失，耗费：消耗。消损。消退。
需要：不消说。
中医学病名：消疾。消渴。

消字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāo］
［《廣韻》相邀切，平宵，心。］
(1)消失，消除，不复存在。
(2)除去，使消失。
(3)减削。
(4)消磨，打发。
(5)享受；受用。
(6)售出。
(7)见“消息”。
(8)禁受，经受。
(9)抵得上，配得上。
(10)需要。
(11)肥大。参见“消熊”。
(12)指消石。
(13)病名。
(14)古代烹饪用语。把肉剁碎后用油煎炒。亦指用此法做出的菜肴。
(15)通“銷”。熔化。
(16)通“逍”。参见“消遥”。
(17)通“蕭”。参见“消條”。
(18)春秋郑国邑名。在今河南省中牟县西。

【巳集上】【水字部】　消； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页626第11
〔古文〕㴅【唐韻】相幺切【集韻】【韻會】思邀切【正韻】先彫切，?音宵。【說文】盡也。又滅也。【易·泰卦】小人道消。　又釋也。【禮·月令】冰凍消釋。　又消耗。【揚子·太?經】九事，七爲消。【註】消，意放散也。　又消消，敝也。【詩·豳風】予尾翛翛。【疏】亦作消消。　又地名。【詩·鄭風】淸人在消。【傳】消，河上地。　又疾名，與痟通。【後漢·李通傳】通素有消疾。【註】消消中之疾也。　又消石，藥名。　又通逍。【禮·檀弓】消搖于門。【註】消搖，又作逍遙。　又【韻補】叶新於切，音須。【崔駰·反都賦】幹弱枝彊，末大本消。叶下臾。　又叶思留切，音脩。【司馬相如·大人賦】煥然霧除。霍然雲消。邪絕少陽而登太隂兮，與眞人乎相求。

消

Значения

Гасить; стирать; уничтожать; гаснуть; стираться, исчезать

Мнемоника

  • Китайская еда очень острая. Гасить водой 氵 жгучесть наперченного и мелко 小 нарезанного мяса 月.

  • "Луна 月 исчезла в воде."
Radicals: 氵, 月  (tsunami, moon, triceratops)
Meaning Mnemonic
A long time ago a huge tsunami swept a triceratops up into the moon and extinguished its life.
I’m sure you’ve heard many theories on how dinosaurs went extinct. Well, this is the real story. Imagine this poor triceratops and all his friends being extinguished by this powerful tsunami, sweeping them up into the moon where there's no air to breathe or leaves to eat.
Reading Mnemonic
This famous event where almost all life was extinguished is reenacted every year for the Shougun (しょう). He's got a bit of an unhealthy obsession with extinguishing life...
Watch the Shougun's eyes light up as an actor dressed like a tsunami crashes into an actor dressed as a triceratops and all of the lights on the stage are extinguished. Spooky...
